manageCookies.title: How to Manage Cookies
manageCookies.intro: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie preferences in several ways:

methods.title: Browser Settings
methods.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to:
options: Delete cookies when you close your browser
Notify you when a website tries to set a cookie

methods.title: Cookie Consent Tool
methods.description: When you first visit our website, you can use our cookie consent banner to choose which categories of cookies you want to accept.

methods.title: Opt-Out Links
methods.description: For specific third-party cookies, you can use these opt-out mechanisms:

manageCookies.warning: Please note that blocking or deleting cookies may impact your experience on our website and limit the functionality available to you.

otherTechnologies.title: Other Tracking Technologies
otherTechnologies.description: In addition to cookies, we may use other tracking technologies:

items.name: Web Beacons
items.description: Small graphic images (also known as pixel tags) that allow us to monitor user activity and site traffic patterns.

items.name: Local Storage
items.description: Browser storage that allows us to store data locally on your device for improved performance and functionality.

items.name: Session Storage
items.description: Temporary storage that is cleared when you close your browser tab or window.

items.name: Device Fingerprinting
items.description: Collecting device and browser configuration information to identify unique devices for security and fraud prevention.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
